shortdesc.ph: Gets the video frame from multiple channels.
Gets the video frame from multiple channels.

section.p: After you successfully register the video frame observer, if you set the return value of as , the SDK triggers this callback each time it receives a video frame from any of the channel. After you successfully register the video frame observer, if you set the return value of as , the SDK triggers this callback each time it receives a video frame from any of the channel.

You can process the video data retrieved from this callback according to your scenario, and send the processed data back to the SDK using the videoFrame parameter in this callback. You can process the video data retrieved from this callback according to your scenario, and send the processed data back to the SDK using the videoFrame parameter in this callback.
section.note: This callback does not support sending RGBA video data back to the SDK. This callback does not support sending RGBA video data back to the SDK.

plentry.pd: The channel ID of this video frame. The channel ID of this video frame.
The ID of the user sending this video frame. The ID of the user sending this video frame.

section.title: Returns Returns
section.p:
Whether to send this video frame to the SDK if post-processing fails: Whether to send this video frame to the SDK if post-processing fails:
: Send. : Send.
: Do not send. : Do not send.
